Welcome to CS:GO (Counter-Strike Russian Offensive)! There are several kind of players in this game: smurfs, cheaters, trolls, afk people, griefers (music guy, teammate killer, camper, non-stop talking, rusher), mad kids, autonoobs, angry russians and derankers. Which one are you going to be? Pick one, and enjoy!
